item.title: Different Types of Security Login Standards for Applications
item.description: This article is about the different types of security standards used for logging into applications Security Login Standards The three main standards I will focus this article on are: HTTP Basic Auth - Least secure OAuth - More secure SAML - Most secure Despite these security standards, a single method is 100% safe. All best practices must be followed to reduce your chances as much as possible in preventing any security breaches to your websites and applications
